entries.arrival_phase_1: The Black Sun is on the move.  Scanning to find the ship's location and trajectory.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Kill the Black Sun Transport before it leaves the system.
entries.assassinate_success: Black Sun Transport destroyed.  Return to Talus and speak with Valance Serth.
entries.autorewardbody: I just got word. Congratulations!  The Black Sun is running from this operation with their tails between their legs.   It looks like the Empire found the remaining spice transport ships and is confiscating the tainted spice now.  Excellent work, friend.  I have one more thing, if you don't mind heading back down here.
entries.escort_wiped_out: Now that the protecting ships are gone, concentrate your fire on the leader.
entries.failed_escape: The ship succeeded in carrying some of the tainted medicinal spice to the galaxy.  You have failed.   Talk to Valance Serth and maybe you can stop another batch.
entries.quest_location_d: Stop a transport before it leaves the Corellia system.
entries.quest_target_d: Destroy the Black Sun Transport before it exits the system.
entries.title: Destroy tainted spice transport ship.
entries.title_d: Destroy the Black Sun Transport before it exits the system.
